Hello world

18 April 2014

Tweet

I'm an engineering undergraduate born in a small town called Chantada, that likes electronics and computer and if you ask me, I'm specially interested in the security area and in robotics.

I would like to use this blog to share some of my experiences and specially the knowledge that I found difficult to locate on the net or that really helped me getting introduced into particular topics like embeded device security.

I think you will find usefull some of my projects and interests and I hope you can learn from my experience the same way I expect learning from your opinions and comments. I would like to see a lot of feedback and/or any questions you think I might be able to solve in my mailbox (antoniovazquezblanco@gmail.com) or in comments (not implemented yet in this blog...).
